name: Bergamot
description: A citrus fruit that provides fresh, sparkling top notes with a slightly spicy character.

name: Jasmine
description: One of the most precious flowers in perfumery, offering rich, sweet, and intoxicating floral notes.

name: Sandalwood
description: A precious wood that provides warm, creamy, and smooth base notes.

name: Vanilla
description: A sweet, comforting note extracted from vanilla pods, adding warmth and sweetness.

name: Patchouli
description: An earthy, rich note with woody and slightly sweet undertones.
